section_title: 24g05  “Of a street, suburban or interurban electric railway”.
text:
(a)   The phrase “of a street, suburban or
interurban electric railway” refers to the various types of streetcar or
electric railway service used in city, suburban, or interurban transportation. (b)   The term “interurban electric railway”
does not include railways which carry freight only and do not carry passengers.
html:
(a)   The phrase “of a street, suburban or interurban electric railway” refers to the various types of streetcar or electric railway service used in city, suburban, or interurban transportation.

 

(b)   The term “interurban electric railway” does not include railways which carry freight only and do not carry passengers.
